properties.areaDesc: Owen, KY; Henry, KY; Carroll, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 10:28PM EST until February 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

Kentucky River at Lockport Lock

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Carroll...Henry...
Owen.

.Heavy rain over the last several hours will cause the river to rise.

The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Kentucky River at Lockport Lock.
* from late tonight to Saturday afternoon.
* At  9:30 PM Wednesday the stage was 29.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 33.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Thursday and continue to
rise to near 34.1 feet Thursday morning. The river will fall
below flood stage by Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 33.0 feet...Low lying roads near the river along and
west of KY 355 flood.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 34.4
feet on Apr 5 2008.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
